text:
Katy Perry Forgives Taylor Swift and Adds, "I’m Sorry for Anything I Ever Did"

Feud over soon? Katy Perry has extended an olive branch to Taylor Swift. In a live interview with Ariana Huffington on her The Thrive Global Podcast Saturday, Perry was asked if she would…
